system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal
Effect: Upon resolving this attack, the user freely uses Misty Terrain.
Requirement: [Fairy] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Fairy-Type attack on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Twinkle Tackle
